contentList.content: Assume your demon form, granting you additional skills.
Pin the target with a grappling hook held with an arrow. Reduce the target Movement drastically until the peg is destroyed, or if the target move too far from the peg.
This target cannot receive damage lower than 3 x Base Level Damage.
Scorched Mind Grip : dealing melee damage while the weapon is under an enchancing status effect will provide 100% chance of applying Bleed Fire to the target for 1 turn.
When receiving a direct attack, Spiritual Summons have 10% chance to see their cooldown reduced by 1 turn.

Start channeling power of extreme temperatures. If another character is also channeling this spell in a 8m radius, then if their Pyrokinetic is higher than their Hydrosophist, they will cast a fire nova dealing [1] and pushing characters 2m aways. If Hydrosophist is the highest, they will cast a frost nova dealing [2], set Chilled for 2 turns and heal surrounding allies. Drain 2 AP per turn, for 2 turns.

Duelist Buckler : dodging a melee attack or receiving a melee critical hit will trigger a bashing counter-attack, dealing Physical damage and push the attacker 2m away, if possible. Can happen once per turn
Ready to channel Thermal Duality. If another character stand in the radius with the same aura activated, they will trigger Thermal Duality at the beginning of their turn.
Throw a shield at an enemy, and bounce up to 4 times, dealing [1] and recover physical and magic armour each hit. Can hit allies.
Summon a supportive deer with healing skills. After summoning it, the next spiritual animal to be summoned will be the coyote.
Make 5 rocks of oils crashing from above, dealing [1] damage and leave oil on the ground.
Spiritual Defense : When receiving a direct attack, Spiritual Summons have 20% chance to see their cooldown reduced by 1 turn.
All enemies will see their Fire Resistance reduced at the end of their turn if they stand in a fire surface.
Condense all cloud surfaces in the area. Deal [1] and inflict Deaf and Bleeding for 2 turns.
The next attack will receive a massive damage boost, but the character can't move.
Increase Constitution by [1] and Water Resistance by [2] for all allied characters in the radius.
High-kick the target to push it 8m away, dealing [1] and set Knocked Down.
Strike the target with your head, dealing [1] damage and set Knocked Down.
Summon a fast and agile spiritual coyote with offensive and support skills. After summoning it, the next spiritual animal to be summoned will be the deer.

Metal pieces start to heat, increasing Fire resistance by [1], reducing Water resistance by [2], Physical and Piercing resistances by [3] and reflect 50% of the melee damage as Fire damage. Also grants immunity to Burning, set Burning on contact and give weapon-based attack a Fire damage bonus.
Attacking a character with Bleeding will recover 1 AP. Can happen only once per turn.
Movement Speed reduced until the pole is destroyed.
Throw a piece of brain to the target, dealing [1] and set Diseased for 2 turns.
The character assumed their demonic form.
Barbed Blade : when attacking, you have 25% chance to set Bleeding on yourself for 1 turn.
Hit the target 5 times, dealing [1] each hit.
Deal greater damage over long distances.
Twins Confidence : Elementals resistances and Dodge are increased by 10 if another character also possess this effect in a 10m range.
Tamed beast will enrage if they lose their tamer from sight, or if they die.
The character Fire Resistance will be lowered if they stand in a fire surface at the end of their turn.
Summon a demonic heart dealing physical damage.
Rush with your shield, dealing [1], pushing the enemies on the path and set Slowed for 1 turn.
Set a satchel charge on the target that explode after 1 turn and massive damage in a 8 meters radius. Can only be used on a mechanical target, and fail if it's not immobile.
Split the guardian armour into 4 parts : Torso, Arms, Feet and Sword
This character still has their master in sight. They will enrage if they lose it.
Change the armor type provided by the Shapeshifting shield.
The beast will enrage if the lose their master from sight, or if they die.

Metal pieces start to heat, increasing Fire resistance by [1], reducing Water resistance by [2], Physical and Piercing resistances by [3] and reflect 50% of the melee damage as Fire damage. Also grants immunity to Burning, set Burning on contact and give weapon-based attack a Fire damage bonus.
Elementals resistances and Dodge are increased by 10 if another character also possess this effect in a 10m range.
This is going to explode ! Run away !
Water swipes treatrously the targets feet, dealing [1] and set Knocked Down for 1 turn. Can only target Wet character or on water surfaces.
